goal.en: High-end optical lenses are leading edge technology for the medicine, semiconductor, mobile phone, surveillance, machine vision, and space industry. This course will teach students how to design optical systems, transform those designs into real optical components, and test them.
goal.ch: 近代光學工程是醫學、半導體、手機、監控、機器視覺和航天工業的前沿技術。 本課程將教學生如何設計光學系統，將這些設計轉化為真正的光學元件，並對其進行測試。
